card.description: This dataset contains various attributes of different abalone, a type of marine snails. The goal is to predict the number of rings in the abalone's shell, which is an indicator of its age.

context.potentialUses: Determine the age of an abalone.

Sex.description: The sex of the abalone: M, F, or I (Infant).

Length.description: Its length at the longest point in millimeters.

Height.description: Its height with the snail in the shell in millimeters.

Whole weight.description: The weight of the entire abalone in grams.

Shucked weight.description: The weight of the snail with the shell removed in grams.

Viscera weight.description: The weight of the viscera, in grams.

Shell weight.description: The weight of the shell after being dried, in grams.
